tutorials.title: Getting Started with NovelMind
tutorials.description: Learn the basics of the NovelMind editor: workspace layout, key panels, and your first scene.
tutorials.author: NovelMind Team

steps.title: Welcome to NovelMind
steps.content: NovelMind is a professional visual novel editor. This quick tour will introduce you to the main panels and workflows.

steps.title: Scene View
steps.content: The Scene View is where you compose your visual novel scenes. Drag characters and backgrounds here to position them.

steps.title: Story Graph
steps.content: The Story Graph shows your narrative flow. Connect dialogue nodes to create branching stories.

steps.title: Inspector
steps.content: Select any element to see its properties in the Inspector. Edit values directly here.

steps.title: Asset Browser
steps.content: Your project assets (images, audio, scripts) are organized in the Asset Browser. Drag assets to the Scene View to use them.

steps.title: Play Your Scene
steps.content: Use the Play toolbar to test your scene. Click Play to see how your story looks in action.

steps.title: You're Ready!
steps.content: That's the basics! Explore the Help Hub for more tutorials on specific features. Happy creating!

hints.content: Drag assets from the Asset Browser to start composing your scene.
Right-click to add your first dialogue node.
